venue.address_2: Off Mt Clinton Road beside the Highland Center at Pinkham Notch
venue.name: Crawford Path Connector

item.description:
We will be hiking two of the 48 peaks that will have flags flying in this the 8th annual Flags on the 48 memorial hike.




We will meet at 8:00 AM at the Clinton Road parking lot - leaving at 8:15 AM and driving up the road to the Edmands Path trailhead. The hike will be done as a loop by going up Edmands Path and down the Crawford Path.

The hike is 8.1 miles in length with 3100 feet of elevation gain with a book time of 5:35. We plan on hiking faster than book time with an expected return time of 3:30 PM.

The hike to the summit of Eisenhower is 3.1 miles, where we will hang from 11:30 to @ 12:15 to see the Stars & Stripes raised by a friend and his family.

We will then hike the 1.8 miles in @45 minutes over to Mt Pierce to see them flying there thanks to Boy Scout Troop 47. We will depart at 1:30 for the 3.2 mile trip back to the Clinton Road parking lot.

After the hike you are invited back to our site at the TarryHo campground where we will be hosting a cookout for some of the FOT48 participants as they start returning from their peaks.

For anybody who would like to camp Friday and/or Sat night, TarryHo is offering GROUP camping on river sites for $8 per person/night.

We will be in the green suburban with the flag attached to the antenna. NH plates with ROT and VFTT stickers on the rear window.
item.name: Flags on the 48 - Mt's Eisenhower & Pierce - ADVANCED (due to planned pace)
